metadata.description: Log analytics workspace name. Can be found under Log analytics "Settings".
Enter Access key for using the Tenable API.
Enter Tenable Secret Key for Authentication.
The location in which the data collection rules and data collection endpoints should be deployed.
Enter Azure Client Id that you have created during app registration
Enter Azure Client Secret that you have created during creating the client secret
Enter Tenant Id of your Microsoft Entra ID
Enter Object id of your Microsoft Entra App
The Lowest Vulnerability severity to store.
Select true if you want to enable Compliance data ingestion from Tenable VM. Default is false.
Select true if you want to enable WAS Asset data ingestion from Tenable VM. Default is false.
Select true if you want to enable WAS Vulnerability data ingestion from Tenable VM. Default is false.
The Lowest Vulnerability severity to store for WAS Vuln.
Schedule in minutes to create new export job from Tenable VM.
Enter name of the table used to store Asset Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error.
Enter name of the table used to store Vulnerability Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error.
Enter name of the table used to store Compliance Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error.
Enter name of the table used to store WAS Asset Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error.
Enter name of the table used to store WAS Vulnerability Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error.

Migrate Classic Application Insights to Log Analytic Workspace which is retiring by 29 Febraury 2024. Use 'Log Analytic Workspace-->Properties' blade having 'Resource ID' property value. This is a fully qualified resourceId which is in format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/{workspaceName}'

properties.description: Data collection endpoint for ingestion api

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now()), json_ratings = parse_json(ratings)
| extend json_ratings_acr = parse_json(json_ratings.acr), json_ratings_aes = parse_json(json_ratings.aes)
| extend ratings_acr_score = toreal(json_ratings_acr.score), ratings_aes_score = toreal(json_ratings_aes.score)
| project-away json_ratings, ratings, json_ratings_acr, json_ratings_aes
